text_importexport_label: lawe mai a me nā palapala hoʻolilo
text_snack_mustbenum: Pono he helu i ka waiwai!
text_snack_toobig: Nui loa ka waiwai i koho ʻia!
text_snack_toosmall: Liʻiliʻi loa ka waiwai i koho ʻia!
text_settings_content1: Maʻaneʻi hiki iā ʻoe ke hoʻonohonoho i ka noi.
text_settings_showadd: Hōʻike i nā pihi "hoʻohui" i nā waihona:
text_importexport_content: Maʻaneʻi hiki iā ʻoe ke lawe a hoʻokuʻu i kāu mau memo.
text_error_loadfile: hewa: hiki ʻole ke hoʻouka i ka faile.
text_help_content: He leka uila nā memo e mālama a hoʻonohonoho ai i nā memo. ʻikepili, a laila kaomi mālama no ka mālama ʻana i nā loli, a i ʻole kaomi holoi e kāpae i ka memo, a i ʻole hoʻi e lele i nā loli akā e mālama i ka memo.
text_about_content1:
Kuleana kope © 2017,2019,2020,2021 ʻO Marco Parrone.
Mālama ʻia nā Kuleana āpau.
text_about_content2: MAU KEIA KULUWA KUMU O KA HUAKAI I HANA IA E GOOGLE. Hōʻike ʻo GOOGLE i nā ʻōlelo āpau e pili ana i nā unuhi, hōʻike a i ʻole hoʻokō ʻia, e pili ana i kekahi mau hōʻoia o ka pono, ka pili ʻana, a me nā ʻōlelo hoʻokō o ka pono, ka pono no kahi ʻāpana kūpono a me ka ʻole.
text_about_content3: Ua unuhi ʻia kēia polokalamu pūnaewele no kāu pono e hoʻohana ana i nā polokalamu unuhi i mana ʻia e Google Translate. Ua hana ʻia nā hana kūpono e hoʻolako i kahi unuhi pololei, akā naʻe, ʻaʻole maikaʻi kahi unuhi automated a ʻaʻole hoʻi i manaʻo ʻia e pani i nā mea unuhi kanaka. Hāʻawi ʻia nā unuhi ma ke ʻano he lawelawe i nā mea hoʻohana o ka pūnaewele marcoparrone.com, a hāʻawi ʻia "e like me ia." ʻAʻohe palapala hoʻokō o kekahi ʻano, i hōʻike ʻia a i ʻole nā manaʻo paha, i hana ʻia e pili ana i ka pololei, ka hilinaʻi, a me ka pololei o nā unuhi i hana ʻia mai ka ʻōlelo Pelekania i kekahi ʻōlelo ʻē aʻe. ʻAʻole hiki ke unuhi pololei ʻia kekahi mau ʻike (e like me nā kiʻi, nā wikiō, Flash, a pēlā aku) ma muli o nā palena o ka polokalamu unuhi. ʻO ka ʻōlelo mana ka mana Pelekane o ka pūnaewele. ʻAʻole paʻa a ʻaʻohe ʻokoʻa nā mea i hana ʻia i ka unuhi a ʻaʻohe ona kū i ke kānāwai no ka hoʻokō a me nā kumu hoʻokō. Inā kū kekahi nīnau e pili ana i ka pololei o ka ʻike i loko o ka pūnaewele i unuhi ʻia, e nānā i ka mana Pelekane o ka pūnaewele ʻo ia ka mana mana.
